segments.text: The atmosphere in the kitchen feels charged, full of unspoken tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a disconnect between the calm outside and the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the gleam of the cookies making the boy reach higher and higher.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But what if he falls? Every second ticks by and the risk grows.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost exhilarating to think about what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems to be in her own world, which is infuriating and concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel anxious as I watch this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
